quotes.text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.

quotes.text: We become what we think about.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

quotes.text: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.

quotes.text: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Never stop doing your best just because someone doesn’t give you credit.
quotes.author: Kamari aka Lyrikal

quotes.text: Be happy with what you have while working for what you want.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.text: If you want something you never had, you have to do something you’ve never done.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.text: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

quotes.text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Success isn’t always about greatness. It’s about consistency.

quotes.text: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: You do not find the happy life. You make it.

quotes.text: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.

quotes.text: If you genuinely want something, don’t wait for it—teach yourself to be impatient.

quotes.text: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.text: Whatever you are, be a good one.

quotes.text: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.

quotes.text: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.

quotes.text: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.text: To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.
quotes.author: Wilson Kanadi

quotes.text: Try not to become a man of success but rather try to become a man of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

quotes.text: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.

quotes.text: Do one thing every day that scares you.

quotes.text: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.

quotes.text: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.

quotes.text: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Believe deep down in your heart that you’re destined to do great things.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: A comfort zone is a beautiful place, but nothing ever grows there.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.

quotes.text: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.

quotes.text: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.

quotes.text: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.

quotes.text: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.

quotes.text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

quotes.text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.

quotes.text: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

quotes.text: If you believe it will work out, you’ll see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles.

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.

quotes.text: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.

quotes.text: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.

quotes.text: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.

quotes.text: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.

quotes.text: The best way out is always through.

quotes.text: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.

quotes.text: If you're going through hell, keep going.

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.

quotes.text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

quotes.text: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

quotes.text: We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.

quotes.text: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

quotes.text: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.

quotes.text: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.

quotes.text: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quotes.text: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.

quotes.text: You can’t go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.

quotes.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

quotes.text: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

quotes.text: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.

quotes.text: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

quotes.text: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.

quotes.text: Courage is grace under pressure.

quotes.text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.

quotes.text: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.

quotes.text: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.

quotes.text: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.

quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: When you stop chasing the wrong things, you give the right things a chance to catch you.

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

quotes.text: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.

quotes.text: You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.

quotes.text: Don’t count the days, make the days count.

quotes.text: You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

quotes.text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.

quotes.text: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

quotes.text: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

quotes.text: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.

quotes.text: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.

quotes.text: Happiness depends upon ourselves.

quotes.text: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.

quotes.text: I can’t change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.

quotes.text: It’s not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.

quotes.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.

quotes.text: What we think, we become.

quotes.text: Stay hungry, stay foolish.

quotes.text: The future depends on what you do today.

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.

quotes.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer.

quotes.text: You are confined only by the walls you build yourself.

quotes.text: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.

quotes.text: You must do the things you think you cannot do.

quotes.text: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

quotes.text: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.

quotes.text: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.

quotes.text: Whatever you are, be a good one.

quotes.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.

quotes.text: Dream big and dare to fail.

quotes.text: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

quotes.text: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.

quotes.text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.

quotes.text: An unexamined life is not worth living.

quotes.text: You are enough just as you are.
